chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: Type
T0: Type
s: seq (T * T0)

Goal:
size (unzip1 s) = size s

Premises:
Notation seq := list
unzip1 = fun S T : Type => map fst : forall S T : Type, seq (S * T) -> seq S Arguments S, T are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope seq_scope]
size = fun T : Type => fix size (s : seq T) : nat := match s with | [::] => 0%nat | _ :: s' => S (size s') end : forall T : Type, seq T -> nat Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope seq_scope]
zip_unzip : forall (S T : Type) (s : seq (S * T)), zip (unzip1 s) (unzip2 s) = s
size_rev : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T), size (rev s) = size s
size_rotr : forall (n0 : nat) (T : Type) (s : seq T), size (rotr n0 s) = size s
size_rot : forall (n0 : nat) (T : Type) (s : seq T), size (rot n0 s) = size s
size_belast : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s : seq T), size (seq.belast x s) = size s
subseqP : reflect (exists2 m : seq bool, size m = size ?s2 & ?s1 = mask m ?s2) (subseq ?s1 ?s2) where ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type s : seq (T * T0) |- eqtype.Equality.type] ?s1 : [T : Type T0 : Type s : seq (T * T0) |- seq (eqtype.Equality.sort ?T)] ?s2 : [T : Type T0 : Type s : seq (T * T0) |- seq (eqtype.Equality.sort ?T)]
size_mask : forall (T : Type) (m : bitseq) (s : seq T), size m = size s -> size (mask m s) = count (fun x : bool => x) m
rev_zip : forall (S T : Type) (s : seq S) (t : seq T), size s = size t -> rev (zip s t) = zip (rev s) (rev t)
size1_zip : forall (S T : Type) (s : seq S) (t : seq T), ssrnat.leq (size s) (size t) -> size (zip s t) = size s
seq_ind2 : forall P : seq ?S -> seq ?T -> Type, P [::] [::] -> (forall (x : ?S) (y : ?T) (s0 : seq ?S) (t : seq ?T), size s0 = size t -> P s0 t -> P (x :: s0) (y :: t)) -> forall (s0 : seq ?S) (t : seq ?T), size s0 = size t -> P s0 t where ?S : [T : Type T0 : Type s : seq (T * T0) |- Type] ?T : [T : Type T0 : Type s : seq (T * T0) |- Type]
size_permutations : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (s : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), uniq s -> size (permutations (T:=T) s) = ssrnat.factorial (size s)
size_reshape : forall (T : Type) (sh : seq nat) (s : seq T), size (reshape sh s) = size sh
size2_zip : forall (S T : Type) (s : seq S) (t : seq T), ssrnat.leq (size t) (size s) -> size (zip s t) = size t
size_take : forall (n0 : nat) (T : Type) (s : seq T), size (take n0 s) = (if ssrnat.leq (S n0) (size s) then n0 else size s)
size_rcons : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T) (x : T), size (rcons s x) = S (size s)
count_predC : forall (T : Type) (a : pred T) (s : seq T), ssrnat.addn (count a s) (count (pred_of_simpl (T:=T) (predC a)) s) = size s
index_last : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (x : eqtype.Equality.sort T) (s : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), uniq (x :: s) -> index (last x s) (x :: s) = size s
size_behead : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T), size (behead s) = Init.Nat.pred (size s)
tallyEl : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (s : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), perm_eq (unzip1 (tally (T:=T) s)) (undup s)
resize_mask : forall (T : Type) (m : bitseq) (s : seq T), {m1 : seq bool | size m1 = size s & mask m s = mask m1 s}
size_scanl : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (g : T1 -> T2 -> T1) (x : T1) (s : seq T2), size (scanl g x s) = size s
size_pairmap : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T1 -> T2) (x : T1) (s : seq T1), size (pairmap f x s) = size s
size_tally_seq : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (bs : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T * nat)), size (tally_seq (T:=T) bs) = sumn (unzip2 bs)
size_pmap_sub : forall (T : Type) (p : pred T) (sT : eqtype.subType (T:=T) p) (s : seq T), size (pmap eqtype.insub s) = count p s
size_zip : forall (S T : Type) (s : seq S) (t : seq T), size (zip s t) = ssrnat.minn (size s) (size t)
size_drop : forall (n0 : nat) (T : Type) (s : seq T), size (drop n0 s) = ssrnat.subn (size s) n0
size_takel : forall (n0 : nat) (T : Type) (s : seq T), ssrnat.leq n0 (size s) -> size (take n0 s) = n0
size_set_nth : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) (n : nat) (y : T), size (set_nth x0 s n y) = ssrnat.maxn (S n) (size s)
size_ncons : forall (T : Type) (n : nat) (x : T) (s : seq T), size (ncons n x s) = ssrnat.addn n (size s)
count_predT : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T), count (pred_of_simpl (T:=T) predT) s = size s
zip_rcons : forall (S T : Type) (s : seq S) (t : seq T) (x : S) (y : T), size s = size t -> zip (rcons s x) (rcons t y) = rcons (zip s t) (x, y)
size_rem : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (x : eqtype.Equality.sort T) (s : seq_predType T), x \in s -> size (rem (T:=T) x s) = Init.Nat.pred (size s)
nth_zip : forall (S T : Type) (x : S) (y : T) (s : seq S) (t : seq T) (i : nat), size s = size t -> nth (x, y) (zip s t) i = (nth x s i, nth y t i)
size_pmap : forall (aT rT : Type) (f : aT -> option rT) (s : seq aT), size (pmap f s) = count (fun x : aT => f x) s
perm_size : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (s1 s2 : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), perm_eq s1 s2 -> size s1 = size s2
size_map : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1), size [seq f i | i <- s] = size s
size_filter : forall (T : Type) (a : pred T) (s : seq T), size [seq x <- s | a x] = count a s
uniq_min_size : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (s1 s2 : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), uniq s1 -> {subset s1 <= s2} -> ssrnat.leq (size s2) (size s1) -> (size s1 = size s2) * (s1 =i s2)
mask_cat : forall (T : Type) (m1 m2 : bitseq) (s1 s2 : seq T), size m1 = size s1 -> mask (m1 ++ m2) (s1 ++ s2) = mask m1 s1 ++ mask m2 s2
eq_from_nth : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s1 s2 : seq T), size s1 = size s2 -> (forall i : nat, ssrnat.leq (S i) (size s1) -> nth x0 s1 i = nth x0 s2 i) -> s1 = s2

```coq
rewrite <- (size_zip _ _ s). rewrite (zip_unzip _ _ s). rewrite perm_size with (s1 := zip (unzip1 s) (unzip2 s)). 2: symmetry; apply zip_unzip. auto.
Qed.```
